src:
Klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019: Persipura dan Persija Perbaiki Posisi
04 Nov 2019, 09:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 menggelar dua pertandingan pekan ke-26 sepanjang Minggu (3/11/2019). Kemenangan berhasil diraih Persija Jakarta dan Persipura Jayapura.
Persija Jakarta menjamu Tira Persikabo di Stadion Patriot Candrabhaga, Kota Bekasi. Sementara itu, Madura United kedatangan tamu jauh, yakni Persipura Jayapura.
Persija berhasil kembali ke jalur kemenangan setelah mengalahkan Tira Persikabo dengan skor 2-0. Tambahan tiga poin membuat Macan Kemayoran naik satu tingkat ke peringkat 14 dengan raihan 27 poin, sedangkan Tira Persikabo tak beranjak dari posisi tujuh dengan raihan 37 poin.
Kemenangan juga diraih Persipura dengan skor 2-0 atas Madura United. Tambahan tiga poin membuat tim berjulukan Mutiara Hitam itu naik ke peringkat ketiga dengan raihan 43 poin. Persipura hanya tertinggal satu angka dari Madura United yang tertahan di posisi kedua.
Tak ada perubahan puncak klasemen sementara Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang masih dihuni Bali United dengan jumlah 55 poin. Begitu juga dengan dasar klasemen yang masih dihuni Semen Padang dengan raihan 23 poin.
Berikut klasemen sementara Shopee Liga 1 2019 sampai Senin (4/11/2019) pagi WIB, selengkapnya.
text:
Shopee Liga 1 Standings 2019: Roma and Persija Improve Position
Nov 04 2019, 09:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 plays two 26th week matches throughout Sunday (11/03/2019). The victory was won by Persija Jakarta and Persipura Jayapura.
Persija Jakarta hosts Tira Persikabo at the Patriot Candrabhaga Stadium, Bekasi City. Meanwhile, Madura United had far-reaching guests, namely Persipura Jayapura.
Persija managed to get back to winning ways after defeating Tira Persikabo by a score of 2-0. An additional three points made the Kemayoran Tiger move up one level to rank 14 with 27 points, while Tira Persikabo did not move from position seven with 37 points.
The victory was also won by Roma with a score of 2-0 over Madura United. An additional three points made the team nicknamed the Black Pearl rose to third place with 43 points. Roma are only one point behind Madura United who are stuck in second place.
There is no change in the top standings of the 2019 Shopee Liga 1 which is still inhabited by Bali United with 55 points. Likewise with the basic standings that are still inhabited by Semen Padang with 23 points.
The following standings while Shopee Liga 1 2019 until Monday (11/04/2019) morning WIB, in full.
